articles.content: Steven Schumacher was angry with the decision-making first-year EFL referee Martin Woods in Plymouth Argyle's 2-2 draw away to Burton Albion, and especially over one key incident which led to his sid… [+4128 chars]

articles.title: Australia 30-10 Samoa: Kangaroos claim third consecutive World Cup with hard-fought victory - BBC
articles.description: Australia claim a third consecutive World Cup with a hard-fought 30-10 victory over Samoa at Old Trafford.
articles.content:
Rugby League World Cup final 2021

articles.title: Attendance Record Smashed But Leaders Run Into Trouble - The Vanarama National League
articles.description: The National League attendance record was obliterated but there was an element of stage fright as the leaders couldn’t put on a show.

articles.author: Matthew Shaw
articles.title: Controversial French Wheelchair World Cup Final referee involved in new controversy after footage emerges - Yorkshire Live
articles.description: Laurent Abrial became the centre of attention during the Wheelchair World Cup Final.
